name: External Visions Demo
description:
This is the Demo for team BitClub's game External Visions External Visions is out!
External Visions on Steam

Game description:

An artistic metroidvania with a classic NES era gameplay, taking the player through the life of an average man escaping his depression in an imaginary world he created around him.

The game takes place in an old, still running business housing. Main character meets various different people on his path to find more happiness in his life.

Fight 60 different enemy types

In each environment different types of enemies await to attack you, each with its own strengths and patterns. Improve your tactics while fighting in either of the 3 difficulties.

3 unique powers

Apart from it's attacking power, each power is equipped with a special ability that you have to combine in order to make your way through the levels and uncover all the secrets. Collect orbs to upgrade your powers for maximum efficiency in your fights.

5 challenging boss fights

At the end of each section of the building a powerful boss awaits to fight you. Overcome your past and the fears that haunt you to regain your true self.

A variety of items to use

Buy items from the shops or obtain them from quests around the building. Use them to unlock new areas and defeat all the enemies that block your way.
